request.name: VmHighRam
request.command: select * from VM.win:time_batch(5 min) having avg(ram_consumption) > 95

request.name: PMUnused
request.command: select * from PM.win:time_batch(5 min) having avg(cpu_consumption) < 10

request.name: CompoHighRT
request.command: select * from PM.win:time_batch(5 min) having avg(cpu_consumption) < 10
